description: Used To Get AI Responses to Some Texts (Prompts)

parameters.paramDescription: The Text of the Request that Need the Response

requestExample: &prompt=i Feel a Little Bet Sick, Should i Be Depresed?
responseExample: I understand that you're not feeling well, but depression is a serious mental health condition that requires professional diagnosis and treatment. If you're concerned about your mental health, please reach out to a qualified mental health professional for help.
responseDescription: Receives AI Response to Your Text if it is Related to the Medical Or Mental Health issues
